#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod=1e9+7;

#define fileinput freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fileoutput freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define T ll t ; cin>>t ; while(t--)

int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    getchar();
    while(t--) {
        char s[12345];
        gets(s);
        ll ans=0;
        for(ll i=0;i<strlen(s);i+=6){
            if(s[i]==s[i+3] && s[i+1]==s[i+4]) ans++;
            else if(s[i]==s[i+4] && s[i+1]==s[i+3]) ans++;
            else if(s[i]==s[i+1] && s[i+3]==s[i+4]) ans++;
        }

        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }

    return 0;
}
